items.title: Identify Ghost
items.content:
Detect presence of a spectral entity at the haunted location

Objective: Confirm the presence of paranormal entities and gather preliminary data.

Procedure:
1.  Initial Assessment: Review the Haunted Site Report for location specifics, reported phenomena, and historical context.
1.  Equipment Calibration: Ensure all spectral detection equipment (EMF meters, thermal scanners, audio recorders) are correctly calibrated per manufacturer guidelines.
1.  Environmental Sweep: Conduct systematic sweeps of the location, recording EMF fluctuations, temperature anomalies, and unusual sounds.
1.  Data Analysis: Analyze gathered data to identify potential spectral signatures. Cross-reference readings with historical data and known paranormal indicators.
1.  Entity Classification (If Possible): Based on available data, attempt to classify the entity (e.g., poltergeist, residual haunting).

Deliverables:
*   Ghost Profile: A detailed report outlining the entity's suspected characteristics, including energy signature, behavior patterns, and potential origin. Include raw data logs and analysis summaries.
items.tags: input>>Haunted Site Report, position>>Field Agent, output>>Ghost Profile, important

items.title: Deploy Trapping Equipment
items.content:
Set up proton trap and containment field around the ghost

Objective: Establish a secure perimeter and deploy the proton trap to contain the identified ghost.

Procedure:
1.  Perimeter Establishment: Based on the Ghost Profile, identify the ghost's likely movement patterns and establish a secure perimeter using caution tape and warning signs to prevent civilian interference.
2.  Proton Trap Placement: Position the proton trap in the center of the ghost's identified zone of activity. Ensure the trap is on a level surface and free from obstructions.
3.  Equipment Calibration: Utilizing the Ecto Scanner, calibrate the proton trap to the specific energy signature identified in the Ghost Profile. Fine-tune the containment field frequency to maximize capture efficiency.
4.  Deployment Initiation: Activate the proton trap remotely, initiating the containment field. Monitor the field's integrity using the Ecto Scanner, adjusting field parameters as necessary to maintain a stable trapping environment.
5.  Verification: Once the ghost is contained, verify successful capture using the Ecto Scanner, confirming that the energy signature is stable within the trap's confines.

Deliverables:
*   Trapping Field: A fully operational electromagnetic containment field, verified for stability and effectiveness in containing the identified ghost. This includes a log of all calibration settings and field adjustments made during deployment.

items.tags: input>>Ghost Profile, position>>Tech Specialist, output>>Trapping Field

items.title: Secure Containment
items.content: Transfer the captured ghost into the containment unit
items.tags: input>>Trapping Field, position>>Containment Officer, output>>Contained Ghost

items.title: Tech Specialist
items.content: Engineer in charge of operating and calibrating trapping equipment

items.title: Field Agent
items.content: On-site specialist responsible for initial ghost detection and engagement

items.title: Containment Officer
items.content: Responsible for safe transfer and storage of captured spirits

items.title: Haunted Site Report
items.content: Document detailing location coordinates and paranormal readings

items.title: Trapping Field
items.content:
Electromagnetic containment field configured to hold a ghost test

A fully operational electromagnetic containment field, verified for stability and effectiveness in containing the identified ghost. This includes a log of all calibration settings and field adjustments made during deployment.

items.title: Containment Unit
items.content: High-security vault for long-term ghost storage

items.title: Ghost Profile
items.content: A detailed report outlining the entity's suspected characteristics, including energy signature, behavior patterns, and potential origin. Include raw data logs and analysis summaries.

items.title: Bob Rayner
items.content: Lead technician specialized in proton pack calibration

items.title: Alice Hunter
items.content: Veteran field agent with expertise in spectral tracking

items.title: Charlie Wells
items.content: Containment officer overseeing ghost vault integrity

items.title: Proton Pack
items.content: Portable particle accelerator used to weaken ghost ectoplasm prior to capture

items.title: Ghost Trap
items.content: Handheld device for containing ghosts once they have been weakened

items.title: Ecto Scanner
items.content: Device for scanning and analyzing paranormal energy signatures in the field
